content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?​

content: I had the conversation with a potential tenant named Maryam Abbasi from Iran.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?​

content: The main topic of our conversation was the rental price of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price?​ Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: Thank you for your time, Peter. It seems like you were unable to agree on a final price with Maryam Abbasi. Would you like to discuss any other topics or aspects of the negotiation?
name: Evaluator

content: No, I'm satisfied with the information provided. Thank you again for your participation. If you have any other topics or questions you'd like to discuss, please let me know.

content: Thank you, Peter. If you're comfortable with continuing the roleplay or discussing other topics, please let me know. Otherwise, we can conclude the session.
name: Evaluator
